item.title: PK Runescape auto talker
item.dc:creator: @Black_pk Black pk
item.description:
@Black_pk wrote:

Heres not my first script just one i made in spare time enjoy!

[code]//} Runescape auto talker by black pk

const
color = ‘white:’;
effect = ‘shake:’;
talk = ‘Free lobbyslobbys show invintory’;

Procedure Signature;
begin
Writeln(’/////////// Auto Talker By: Black Pk \\\\\’);
Writeln(‘ppppppppppp kk kk’);
Writeln(’ pp pp kk kk’);
Writeln(’ pp pp kk kk’);
Writeln(’ pp pp kkk’);
Writeln(’ pppppppppp kkk’);
Writeln(’ pp kk kk’);
Writeln(’ pp kk kk’);
Writeln(’ pp kk kk’);
end;

Procedure Time; //} u got 5 secs
begin
Writeln(‘Starts in 5 secs.’);
wait(1000)
Writeln(‘4’);
wait(1000)
Writeln(‘3’);
wait(1000)
Writeln(‘2’);
wait(1000)
Writeln(‘1’);
wait(1000)
Writeln(’~Starting~’);
end;

procedure talking;
begin
wait(1000)
SendKeys(color+effect+talk)
Keydown(13);
sleep(1);
Keyup(13);
end;

begin
Signature;
Time;
repeat
talking;
wait(2500);
until(false)
end.
[/code]
101% me lol

Read full topic
